name: Boiling Point
description: Forget player upgrades, in this game you upgrade the enemies! In this place it is boil or be boiled... All your enemies have unique interactions, can you find out? Hope you enjoy, thanks for playing!
controls: WASD, M, R, Esc & Mouse buttons

name: Absurd^2
description: Simple platofrmer, Sequel of Stoic^2. Takes about 10 maybe 15 minutes to beat. Hope you enjoy!

name: Stoic^2
description: Simple platformer made in a matter of hours, takes 2 minutes to beat. Enjoy!

name: Betorched
description: There are rumors of an artifact which has powers so great its incomprehensible. Now its time for you and Matchstick to go on a journey for it. This wont be easy though since there's danger around every corner, Good luck. This game is a proper remake of 'Sley Tha Spooir' which got the 21st place in the GMTK Game Jam 2019. Betorched is a series of turn based combat encounters with items and character progression in between them. Its a roguelite so there is permadeath and most elements of each playthrough are randomized. It might look simple but offers a lot of gameplay depth, Lore, Worldbuilding and an overall (I hope) enjoyable experience. This is my latest and greatest game up to date. I would love to hear your thoughts on it, I have some Betorched updates planned but mostly it is a finished product. Thanks for checking it out, hope you enjoy!

name: WavePunk
description: When 2 waves of the same frequencies join together it creates a new wave called Superposition! Certain wave frequencies can even shatter glass! Use that to your advantage in this brand new 2D Action Puzzle Platformer! The game is about 5-10 minutes long, we really hope you enjoy playing it

name: Gun Stick Dash Jump
description: The colorland is being corrupted! Now go deal with it. The game is a sidescroller with a bunch of different mechanics which you slowly lose because of corruption. The corruptions are random so each run is going to be unique. Also there are some combos, movement techniques and secrets which arent obvious, try figuring them out! I was really tight on time but I think it turned out pretty nice, hope you enjoy it.

name: WordDart
description: WordDart is the online mobile version of the last letter game. The objective is to come up with a word that starts with the last letter of the previously given word. Only singular nouns are allowed - names, brands and places are excluded. The game offers 2 modes. Timed - play against time, while competing for the highest score. Elimination - survive the wave or get eliminated! Start playing now with your friends! Play now online with your friends, against AI or even by yourself!
